name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在使學生了解認知人因工程理論與研究方法，並使學生能應用這些理論與研究方法來探討與解決實際問題，提升整體系統之績效。
schedule:
Week 1: Lecture: Introduction to Cognitive Ergonomics (Read Ch. 1 of Ref. book 1)
Week 2: Discussion 1: Ch. 1 (Read Ch. 2 of Ref. book 1)
Week 3: Discussion 2: Ch. 2 (Read Ch. 3 of Ref. book 1)
Week 4: Discussion 3: Ch. 3 and Signal Detection Theory
Week 5: Lecture: Information Theory and Axiomatic Design
Week 6: Demonstration: FaceLab Gaze Tracking System
Week 7: Lecture: Mental Models and Card Sorting (Read assigned paper)
Week 8: Discussion 4: Assigned paper and Attention (Read assigned paper)
Week 9: Mid-term exam
Week 10: Discussion 5: Assigned paper and Mental Workload (Read assigned paper)
Week 11: Discussion 6: Assigned paper and Situation Awareness
Week 12: Lecture: Applications
Week 13: Lecture: Applications
Week 14: Paper Presentation
Week 15: Paper Presentation
Week 16: Paper Presentation
Week 17: Team Final Report
Week 18: Team Final Report
scorePolicy:
Mid-term exam: 30%
Discussion: 5% x6 = 30%
Paper presentation: 20%
Team final report 20%
materials:
1. Attention, Perception, and Memory: An Integrated Introduction by Elizabeth A.  Styles, 2005, Psychology Press, NTUT Library Electronic Book.
2. Engineering Psychology and Human Performance (3rd. Eds.),
Wickens and Hollands, 2000 (Prentice Hall, 滄海)
